mapper.insert: insert into card ( product_id, card_no, card_password, priority, creater, create_time, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{cardNo}, #{cardPassword}, #{priority}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{updater}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: select id, product_id, card_no, card_password, priority, creater, create_time, updater, update_time from card where id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.product_id as "productId", t2.name as "productName", t1.card_no as "cardNo" t1.card_password as "cardPassword", t1.priority as "priority" from card t1 left join product t2 on t1.product_id=t2.id order by t1.card_no, t1.update_time desc
